DIV.NAME: ALPHA
DIV.TITLE: Welcome!
DIV.META: Questions regarding the Amazon Auction Import should be directed to support@zoovy.com.

DIV.NAME: OMEGA
DIV.META: WARNING: The Amazon Auction Import is currently in open beta state, which means you are welcome to submit your Amazon Auctions for processing, however they may not be immediately processed. Questions regarding the Amazon Auction Import should be directed to support@zoovy.com. Please allow 72 hours for processing of Imported Auctions. We expect the Full version of the Amazon Auction Import to be available no later than Nov. 1st.
